attributes.action: Give free school meals to eligible children during and out of term time.
attributes.additional_details: Following the tragic death of arthur labinjo-hughes who was starved and tortured during lockdown, it is even more apparent how vital this service would be for disadvantaged children up and down the country.
attributes.background: Setup a meals on wheels service to feed eligible children in and out of term time.

rejection.details: Delivering free school meals is a matter for relevant local authorities, but you may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600474
